name: latamtradex
description: Latam Tradex - B2B/B2C Platform for SMEs

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../catalog-service && npm install && cd ../order-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:auth && npm run build:catalog && npm run build:order
scripts.kafka:create-topics: docker exec -it latamtradex-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic user.registered --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec -it latamtradex-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic order.created --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec -it latamtradex-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic order.updated --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec -it latamtradex-kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic stock.updated --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1

author: Latam Tradex Team
